rows.stringify: $(identity.pronouns.singular) only respects powerful and competent leaders.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) $(frequency) challenges others to duels to the death.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) feels at home in high altitude.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) will turn anything into an opportunity for training.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) enjoys messing with other humanoids with $(identity.pronouns.possessive) stature.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) maintains a friendly relationships with nearby giants.
